Amidst a huge supplements boost in the U.S. this year due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, clinical experience and scientific literature remain key when making recommendations for patients. According to a recent study, nearly half of Americans have begun adding more supplements as a part of their wellness regime, part of an overall huge supplements boost in the U.S. that is [not expected to level off](https://www.phillyvoice.com/supplement-use-united-states-covid-pandemic/) post-COVID, as exemplified in the top chiropractic supplements articles from this year.
